page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox updaterow method

argument.name: target
argument.description: The index or value of the row to update in the list. See *[link:A5.ListBox.getIndex]*.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data to update the row with.

page.description: Update a row in the list.

discussion.p: The data used to update a row in the list can be sparse. Any values not included in the data object will be left at their current values. The value of the row will be updated to reflect any changes in the rows data.
